mapper.select: select SUM(CASE WHEN ci.type IN ('0', '1', '2') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS provinceCount, SUM(CASE WHEN ci.type IN ('3', '2') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cityCount, SUM(CASE WHEN ci.type IN ('4', '5') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS countyCount from weather_district_info as ci where ST_Contains(POLYGON(ST_GeomFromText(CONCAT('LINESTRING(', #{lonMin}, ' ', #{latMin},',', #{lonMin}, ' ', #{latMax},',', #{lonMax}, ' ', #{latMax},',', #{lonMax}, ' ', #{latMin},',', #{lonMin}, ' ', #{latMin}, ')'))),POINT(ci.lon, ci.lat)) = 1
select code, path from weather_type_pic_mapping where `delete` = '0'
